import{observeTimeline}from'motion-dom';import{scrollInfo}from'./track.mjs';import{getTimeline}from'./utils/get-timeline.mjs';/**
 * If the onScroll function has two arguments, it's expecting
 * more specific information about the scroll from scrollInfo.
 */function isOnScrollWithInfo(onScroll){return onScroll.length===2;}function attachToFunction(onScroll,options){if(isOnScrollWithInfo(onScroll)){return scrollInfo(info=>{onScroll(info[options.axis].progress,info);},options);}else{return observeTimeline(onScroll,getTimeline(options));}}export{attachToFunction};
